value.title: Test of SandDance, a Microsoft Research visualization in Power BI
value.excerpt: You probably heard the news about the new visualization that Microsoft Research release a few days ago. In this video I just give it a go and show you some of the features and questions I have.  If you prefer to read about it, check out my review on the Power BI Community: http://community.powerbi.com/t5/Community-Blog/SandDance-my-first-impressions-and-test/ba-p/30479

value.title: 3 things to get up and running with KPIs in Reporting Services 2016 (CTP 3.3)
